content: That sounds like a great playlist! I think I'll also add some classic summer jams like "Summertime" by DJ Jazzy Jeff & The Fresh Prince and "School's Out" by Alice Cooper to get everyone in a fun mood. By the way, I'm really looking forward to this BBQ, it's been a while since I've hosted one. I just got back from a weekend getaway to the beach house with my friends and I'm still feeling the relaxed, beachy vibe.
